title: [Large-Scale] SRL-Based Critical Thinking Education Design for COVID-19 Crisis Response

context.prior_knowledge: Basic competency in online learning tools and foundational knowledge of language curriculum
context.additional_context: Providing digital devices for student-led learning activities in VR/simulation environments, applying real-world problem-solving scenarios in COVID-19 contexts

learning_goals: Learners will apply self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies to derive solutions for real-world COVID-19 scenarios with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will present three or more decision-making criteria demonstrating critical thinking skills in a multimedia game-based simulation environment.
Learners will use a self-assessment rubric to review their learning process and incorporate feedback into 70% or more items of their reflective report.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
